name: Hospital Only Prescribing
title: Hospital Only Prescribing
numerator_where:
bnf_code IN (SELECT DISTINCT(bnf_code) FROM {measures}.dmd_objs_hospital_only)
AND bnf_code NOT IN (
'0406000S0AAACAC', -- Ondansetron HCl_Tab 8mg
'0408010F0AAABAB', -- Clonazepam_Tab 500mcg
'0408010F0AAACAC', -- Clonazepam_Tab 2mg
'0703021Q0AAAAAA', -- Desogestrel_Tab 75mcg
'0704050R0AAABAB' -- Tadalafil_Tab 20mg
